body:
Go ahead and ask me anything. 
Seriously, anything
body_tagged:
Go ahead and ask me anything. 
Seriously, anything
title: AMA! Honest ;)

replies.body: How did you come up with your name?
replies.body_tagged: How did you come up with your name?

replies.body:
Do you watch anime? If so what are your 3 most favorite?

Mine are: (in order)

3- FullMetal Alchemist Brotherhood

2- The last Airbender/ The Legend of Korra (cmon its an og)

1- Attack on Titan

replies.body: I don't have a question but I just wanted to tell you that I found Heartless! https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/cc15ad56f I know your life hasn't been the same ever since you weren't able to find him so I hope you're able to have a normal life from now on!
replies.body_tagged: I don't have a question but I just wanted to tell you that I found Heartless! https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/cc15ad56f I know your life hasn't been the same ever since you weren't able to find him so I hope you're able to have a normal life from now on!

replies.body:
Opinions on me?
What do you think about the current staff team?
replies.body_tagged:
Opinions on me?
What do you think about the current staff team?

replies.body:
@Junr 
I wanted a cool name 
I was like wow I'm awesome 
Hmm what's alliterative with awesome??
Apples? Nah.. Apricot!! And that's it!

@savageminemen 
Never watched anime 

@tazz 
You are overall good for the community taking it to a good competitive standard 
I think you do have a big ego but I find you funny and blunt which is similar to me so I like it :D
My opinion is that you should think a bit more about others ;) but keep on doing good shit 

@Borroh 
Hm I'm not too familiar with you so don't really have an opinion ;(

@Dabadermc
Nice guy and likeable :D
Definitely vanilla with jam and whipped cream topped with some icing sugar. No other way.

@PieZ 
You seem like a sound guy, seem like good fun:D
Don't get me started on how the server could improve..
I actually cannot be arsed to say haha, when I build a new pc I'll talk to you one time :D
Same for staff really. You'll find that if the server grows the staff will mature with it.
Community slack is well maintained.

@TwentyOneNemos 
I love you you're a great guy absolutely nothing but love
And killfarming but ya
Just had my last exam, so now A2 starts. Great. 
Being from Leicester, obviously Leicester tigers :D
On a sidenote change your name to twentyoneemos 
Also I'm going to leedsfest and |-/ are playing jealous???? 

@4lextr quality lad nothing but love :D
Probably like to be a journalist, but ultimate goal is social revolution ;)
Omg
Defence: Pizza, Robin
Midline: 1theodore1, Ron, Glitchy
Offence: Bmb, Remy, Zeus 
All in their prime :D 

@loo fuck off

@SnowSX3 ngl find you a bit odd haha but seem pretty cool
Current staff team seem alright idk ain't been on in a while

replies.body:
Why do people call you April?
Ingigo is your irl friend right? Describe him irl
Where do you live? Is it a nice place? Would you recommend someone to visit the place?
Opinions on Avicus?  How long more do you think it will last?
Will you ever straightline me again?
Opinions on Apollo?
Opinions on me? I know you don't know me very well though

replies.body: Opinions on me although I haven't talked to you really
replies.body_tagged: Opinions on me although I haven't talked to you really

replies.body: I don't know if you really know me, if you do tell me your opinions on me. Also, your favorite color and food? What do you think will avicus look like in the future?
replies.body_tagged: I don't know if you really know me, if you do tell me your opinions on me. Also, your favorite color and food? What do you think will avicus look like in the future?

replies.body:
@raging Rugby obviously ;)

@Steven I think you're bloody hilarious, a good builder and an excellent banter. Keep up the good work.

@Blaze because yoavkippee didn't like saying awesome or apricot so he said April and I called him may and Theo was March but I never used that. Mine stuck.
Ingi is quiet, but funny when you know him. He's a good lad and a good friend.
I live in Leicester (up the city!). Some areas are good but most is a shithole. Wouldn't recommend, unless you like sport. We have basketball, rugby and football champions in the last 5 years. Also Loughborough.
Avicus should go for a competitive scene. Otherwise I see no future further than 2017.
Never will straightline you again.
I love apollo. I'm still active in slack and would have played the tourney if it wasn't for my laptop going poop a week before:(

You seem a decent lad and a good member of the community! 

@elemental seem like a nice guy, community regular and seem relatively polite

@juanno don't really know you but I respect someone that says what they think whenever so +1. Good Pvper in your own right so don't change lad 

@sayah good lad, lotta love here :D good pvp gg

@Delicious good mod, nice around here, doing good shit for everyone which I appreciate if it doesn't look like I do favourite colour is green and future wise I don't see one unless competitive is pushed hella lot

Avicus should go for a competitive scene. Otherwise I see no future further than 2017.
